about_the_game:
YOKO :Between life and death, "YOKO" offers a unique paranormal experience. As a newcomer to a mysterious house, Yoko finds herself immersed in a haunting journey, full of intriguing riddles. Explore the intimate areas of Saikominami, at the foot of majestic Mount Fuji, and uncover the dark secrets that permeate this sleepy town. Upon acquiring her new home, be prepared to uncover the inexplicable that awaits in the shadows, challenging her courage and instigating her curiosity.


MAIN FEATURES:

  • Innovative approach to Yoko's world returning to the origins of old-school first-person survival horror
  • Most confusing and complex story ever seen in a horror game
  • Own soundtrack created by renowned international musician Lucaskyioshi

INTRIGUING NARRATIVE:
Immerse yourself in an engaging story, where Yoko, in search of her first home, finds herself confronted by supernatural mysteries. Uncover dark secrets, explore notes left by longtime residents, and uncover the truth behind the region's mysterious disappearances.

SUPERNATURAL CHALLENGES:
Face the unknown as you break local evils and defy supernatural forces. Utilize your instincts to overcome unique challenges, each designed to test your courage and determination as you uncover hidden secrets.

REALISTIC ENVIRONMENT:
Explore detailed and realistic environments in the intimate areas of Saikominami, with stunning graphics that immerse players in a tense and mysterious atmosphere. Feel the supernatural presence as you navigate places marked by the past and the spirits that roam between life and death.

REDEMPTION MISSION:
Take on the role of Yoko, whose mission goes beyond simply acquiring a home. Lead lost souls to eternal peace by unlocking mysteries that connect the worlds of the living and the dead. Your choices shape the destiny of not only Yoko, but also the souls seeking redemption.

TENSE AND IMMERSIVE ATMOSPHERE:
Feel the tension build as the plot unfolds, with an immersive soundtrack and sound effects that create a unique atmosphere of suspense and mystery. Yoko's every step brings with it the promise of unsettling discoveries and otherworldly challenges.

In "YOKO - Between Life and Death", your courage will be tested as you face the supernatural and uncover dark secrets on a journey full of emotions. Be prepared for a horror and suspense experience that goes beyond the conventional. Adventure now and find out if you have what it takes to face the mysteries of Saikominami.

content_descriptors.notes: Violent psychological horror game addressing themes of suicide and use of hallucinogenic medicine
